item.title: Shoes course registrations have started!
item.dc:creator: Victor Goff
item.content:encoded:
Satish announced the RubyLearning.org new course.

Ruby and Shoes Programming: A New Course

Yay! I'm really really looking forward to see you in the course. :-D
If you are interested in, please join us.

Let's enjoy Ruby and Shoes programming!
ashbb
